title: 求助大神服务器崩溃问题！！！悬赏全部身家！
author: est、玉米
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.

replies.author: qwe1212456
replies.txt_content:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/multiplayer/WorldClient
Exception in server tick loop 
缺少文件 导致循环

replies.author: est、玉米
replies.txt_content:
qwe1212456 发表于 2014-11-23 13:43
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/multiplayer/WorldClient

replies.txt_content: 到光源那里就报错了，看一看是不是光源的问题吧
